talents.desc:
Split into three elemental spirits for 15.15 seconds, each with 50% of your maximum Health, and enables two new leaping attacks for use.

Earth attacks slowly for 20 damage and slows enemies by 25%. 
Fire attacks quickly for 18 damage.

talents.desc: For 3 seconds, you can activate Blink again to return to the point where it was cast from.
